modName: Push list of Skyrim male armour mods
summary: For every single male armour mod you'll find 3 to 4 female armour mods(maybe more). This list contains around 300+ links to male armour mods, uploaded on SkyrimNexus only. (just links)
descriptionHtml:
[b][i] REPORT ANY BROKEN LINKS SO I CAN FIX THEM!![/b][/i]


Details
========
Version: 1.5
Date: 15.11.2013
Category: Utilities
Author(s): Pushkatu
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/edit/?id=47158
Requirements: Microsoft Office 2003/2007 or OpenOffice


Description/ reason why I made this
===========
Every time you search for "male" armours, all you get is a hole bunch of fe(male) armour mods as a result. There are 3200+ armor mods uploaded on SkyrimNexus right now and that number is growing rather fast. This list gives easier acces to most male amour mods available, all with a few clicks. No longer will you have to spend hours searching for your desired armour. 




Install
=======
Extract it's contents to your desktop( or any other location you want) and double click on the file.

Uninstall
=========

Just delete the file :)


Incompatibility
===============

!!!WARNING!!!

Incompatible with trolls! If you are not a troll then you'll have no problems using it.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None!

History
=======
17.11.2013 - New category "Clothing" with 100+ new links 
15.11.2013 - Initial release


Contact
=======

You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as 'Pushkatu'
You can find me on TESNexus as 'Pushkatu'
You can send me an email here: pushkatu@yahoo.com

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to all the modders out there that make Skyrim a better game.
Thanks to Skyrimnexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks....all.

Licensing/Legal
===============
I can't imagine using this anywhere else than Nexus, so what ever...
For now, I'm the only person authorized to modify this file. If you see this elsewhere, it's not mine.
Don't forget that each mod has it's own readme file or it should have. Reading only this won't help at all when installing the mods.
Some of these mods might not compatible with each other so don't blame me if it'll scrue up your game. 
Some of these mods are not lore friendly, but are still amazing mods.
Some of these mods might require other mods in order to work properly, mods that are not listed here so once again make sure you read each mod's readme.
I did not create any of these mods so all the credit goes to the authors. All I did was to make this list.
